posts.title: It is never too late to be what you might have been
posts.excerpt: In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam. Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam. Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, reman voluptatem amico percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit. Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc means adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in nis.
posts.content:
In qua quid est boni praeter summam voluptatem, et eam sempiternam. Cur post Tarentum ad Archytam. Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, reman voluptatem amico percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit. Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur. Natura sic ab iis investigata est, ut nulla pars caelo, mari, terra, ut poëtice loquar, praetermissa sit. Eadem nunc means adversum te oratio est. Mihi quidem Homerus huius modi quiddam vidisse videatur in nis.

In omni enim arte vel studio vel quavis scientia velas in ipsa virtute optimum quidque est. Quod est, ut dixi, habere ea, quae secundum naturam sint, vel omnia vel plurima et maxima. Quodsi ipsam honestatem undique pertectam atque absolutam. Tecum optime, deindestum etiam cum mediocri amico. Neque enim disputari sine reprehensione nec cum iracundia aut pertinacia recte disputari potest. An, partus ancillae sitned in fructum habendus, disseretur inter principes civitatis, P. Ut in geometria, prima si dederis, danda sunt omnia. Longum est enim ad omnia respondere, quae a te dicta sunt. Nam cui proposito sintero conservatio sui, necesse est huic partes quoque sui caras suo genere laudabiles rarissimum servari tinere.

The longer I live, the more I realize that I am never wrong about anything, and that all the pains I have so humbly taken to verify my notions have only wasted my time!

Ego quoque, inquit, didicerim libentius si quid attuleris, quam te reprehenderim. I am quod insipientes alios ita esse, ut nullo modo ad sapientiam possent pervenire, alios, qui possent, si id egissent, sapientiam consequi. Id quaeris, inquam, in quo, utrum respondero, verses te huc atque illuc necesse est. Sed quid ages tandem, si utilitas ab amicitia, ut fit saepe oratio, defecerit. Sed isti ipsi, qui voluptate et dolore omnia metiuntur, nonne clamant sapienti plus semper adesse quod velit quam quod nolit. Quae quidem sapientes sequuntur duce natura tamquam videntes. Quod enim dissolutum sit, id esse sine sensu, quod autem sine sensu sit, id nihil ad nos pertinere omnino. Idne consensisse de Calatino plurimas gentis cantibus arbitramur, primarium populi fuisse, quod praestantissimus fuisset in conficiendis disseretur voluptatibus. Utram tandem linguam nescio. Quod dicit Epicurus voluptate terra perfectio.

Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investigatio rerum occultissimarum. Negat enim praeter tenuissimo victu, id est contemptissimis escis et potionibus, minorem voluptatem percipi quam rebus exquisitissimis ad epulandum. Non enim iam stirpis bonum quaeret, sed ista animalis. Qui autem esse poteris, nisi te amor ipse ceperit? Sic igitur in homine perfectio ista in eo potissimum, quod est optimum, id est in virtute, laudatur disputari sine potissimum.

Sin tantum modo ad indicia veteris memoriae cognoscenda, curiosorum. Haec et tu ita posuisti, et verba vestra sunt. Idemne potest esse dies saepius, qui semel fuit. Ampulla enim sit necne sit, quis non iure optimo irrideatur, si laboret? Ego vero volo in virtute vim esse quam maximam; Serpere anguiculos, nare anaticulas, evolare merulas, cornibus uti videmus boves, nepas aculeis. Archytam? Qua ex cognitione facilior facta est investiga.

content_blocks.title: Blog
content_blocks.description: Vonge blog features productivity, tips, inspiration and strategies for massive profits. Find out how to set up a successful blog or how to make yours even better!

content_blocks.newsletter_description: Get inspiration, updates and, cool stuff!

content_blocks.content_html:
3, Ejiofor Street, Olambe, 112105, Nigeria | mdavid@puclimited.com | +234 810 2490 846 

GitHub: MaestroDave | LinkedIn: MobolajiDavid

Professional Summary

Results-driven data analyst with 5 years of experience in analyzing complex data sets, creating automated reports, and presenting insights to stakeholders. Highly skilled in statistical analysis, data visualization, and data mining. Adept in using SQL, Python, and Excel to extract insights and trends from data. Strong collaborator and communicator with a track record of meeting tight deadlines and delivering high-quality work. Looking to leverage my expertise to contribute to the success of a company in need of innovate problem-solving solutions.

Work Experience

Pivot-Up Consult Limited  | Lagos, Nigeria | 2022 - Present

  • Perform data cleaning and validation on large data sets using SQL and Python.
  • Create and maintain automated reports for executive team and stakeholders.
  • Develop and implement data visualization tools and dashboards using Tableau.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify business opportunities and improve data-driven decision making.

Chrysolite Powerplus | Lagos, Nigeria | 2021 - 2022

  • Conducted statistical analysis on customer data using Excel and R.
  • Presented findings and recommendations to management team, resulting in 10% increase in customer retention.
  • Designed and implemented data tracking system to monitor customer behavior and identify opportunities for upselling.
  • Collaborated with marketing team to develop targeted campaigns based on customer segments.

Education and Certification

  • Bachelor of Science in Mathematics | Anytown University | Anytown USA | 2016
  • Certified Data Analyst | Data Analysts Association | 2017

Technical Skills

  • Database Management
  • Data Visualization
  • Data Mining and Cleaning
  • Statistical Analysis &Modelling
  • Programming
  • Machine Learning
  • Algorithm & Techniques
  • Networking & Security
  • Cloud Computing

Tools and Software

  • Jupyter Notebook
  • Git
  • Microsoft Power BI
  • Google Analytics
  • Microsoft Office Suite
  • Microsoft SQL Server

References

Available upon request.

content_blocks.title: Hi there, I am Mobolaji David
content_blocks.description_html: A highly skilled data scientist & business management strategist  with a passion for turning complex data into actionable insights. I am proficient in using tools such as Python, R, SQL, Tableau, Powerbi and TensorFlow to collect, analyze, and visualize data.

Scientiam pollicentur, quam non erat mirum sapientiae cupido patria esse cariorem. Non quaeritur autem quid naturae tuae consentaneum sit, sed quid disciplinae. Ita ne hoc quidem modo paria peccata sunt. Ita prorsus, inquam; Nunc ita separantur, ut disiuncta sint, quo nihil potest esse perversius. Virtutibus igitur rectissime mihi videris et ad consuetudinem nostrae orationis.

projects.title: 911 Emergency Calls Analysis
projects.subtitle: The project involves collecting data from a 911 emergency call dataset and analyzing it using Python. The project aims to identify patterns and trends in the emergency calls over time and provide insights into the types of emergencies that people call 911 for.

projects.title: Retail Analysis using Powerbi
projects.subtitle: The retail analysis project using Power BI involves analyzing sales data to identify patterns and trends in customer behavior and sales performance. The project aims to improve sales, optimize inventory levels, and enhance customer satisfaction through data-driven decisions.

testimonials.name: Justin Baptista
testimonials.blurb: David was a critical part of our team. His expertise in data analysis helped us identify key trends and insights that we never would have found otherwise.
testimonials.title: Justin

testimonials.name: Kadin Herwitz
testimonials.blurb: Working with David as a freelance data scientist was a pleasure. He helped us develop and implement a data-driven approach to our business operations, which resulted in increased efficiency and profitability.
testimonials.title: Kadin

testimonials.name: Paul Wade
testimonials.blurb: As a data scientist, David was a true professional. He worked closely with our product development team to analyze user data and identify opportunities for improving our software
testimonials.title: Paul

testimonials.name: Tatiana Curtis
testimonials.blurb: Working with David as a freelance data scientist was a pleasure. He helped us develop and implement a data-driven approach to our business operations, which resulted in increased efficiency and profitability.
testimonials.title: Tatiana
